<abstract>
 <para>This chapter describes about configurations used in Collaboration. It consists of the following main sections:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.ComponentsineXoCollaborationConfiguration">Components</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the services which provide low-level functionality for UI components of Collaboration. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.ExternalComponentPlugins">External Component Plugins</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the main component plugins used in Collaboration. Each part supplies an example
           configuration with the explanation about ini-params so you can know how to use these plugins. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.eXoChatserverConfiguration">Data Injectors</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of data injectors used to create data for performance test in Collaboration and instruction on how to use them.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.eXoChatserverConfiguration">eXo Chatserver Configuration</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the eXo Chatserver configuration in Collaboration. </para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
